Text:
MALWARE BULLSHIT
AVIRA found malware in the keygen...
DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
FYI - the keygen seems to work on latest release (8.8.1.5 as of this writing)
What the hell do you type in the 10 digit OrderID?! I tried all combinations I could think of and the stupid generator still says invalid code. WTF is up with that?
Keygen works just fine, even on later versions. Haven't you guys ever heard of a false positive?

Keygen does not work if a later version has been previously installed and allowed to expire.  Uninstall newer version, install this version, activation fails.  Says "Error: Cannot decode Activation Key: Decode: cannot find pattern".  Latest Avira finds no malware.

Solution for error is :


1. Set system date to 1 May 2010 (from Run prompt "CMD /K DATE")

2. Install GoodSync.

3. Register with the use of the keygen. Choose online activation via browser.
Enter your username and think of a 10 digit OrderID.
Use keygen to generate a corresponding activation code
for the request code the application will show.

4. Reset system date to today's date.

------------------------------

Still working Great!!
Used new instructions to avoid the Error.
Updated to newest Version 9.0.3.7 for x86 with no problems!!

Downloaded this today 14/02/2012 followed install instructions. Works perfectly still. after installed I downloaded latest version 9077 and installed over this 8725 version. This again works perfectly. Just block network activity for this product in your firewall. Installed this on windows 7 64bit
@zonzisa - thanks, your fix for the error worked for me. - much appreciated!
Thank you so much zonzisa!! You finally solved my problem!! :D
